page.title: 07HOUSES IN NORTH SCARLE
page.content: In North Scarle there are 49 bungalows of which 4 are semi-detached and the rest are detached houses.None of them are modern. There are 62 detached houses .There is 1 terraced block of 4 dwellings,one is a grocers shop. None of the bungalows were built before 1900 only 1 semi-detached house was built then.8 were built just before the second world war and the other one was built in the 1950's Most of the detached houses were built before 1900,there are 49.Most of them have been modernised.Only 3 were built between 1900 and 1918 .One was built before second world war and one in the 1950's.8 are recently built.These are big houses in their own grounds.The terraced block was built before 1900. There are 122 houses in North Scarle
